examples: I’d like to know how many banked tickets we have
Number of tickets
How many tickets are there
Banked tickets
metadata: Sure, let me pull up your information. Your company has 45 banked tickets with a value of $24,700 on 8 different airlines. Would you like more information about your banked tickets?

examples: Which travelers have the most banked tickets
Who has the most banked tickets
Who has the tickets
Which travelers are they
metadata: Adam Malcolm and Barti Somaasundaram have the most banked tickets. Adam has 15 and Barti has 12.

examples: What is my market share for Enterprise Rental Car? Am I hitting my market share goals?
Enterprise Rental Car
Market Share Goals
What is my market share
Am I hitting my market share goals with Enterprise Rental Car
metadata: Your market share on Enterprise Rental Car is 42 percent. Your market share goal is 40 percent, so your company is hitting its target.

examples: I would like to learn more about my hotel savings opportunities. What are my most popular hotels booked?
What are my most popular hotels booked
Which hotels have I booked the most?
metadata: You have had 280 bookings with Marriott chain hotels and 175 with Hilton chain hotel properties. The Beltway Marriott is your top booked hotel, with 63 room nights booked over 38 different reservations

examples: When should I ask a hotel or a chain for a discount
How do I get discounts on hotels
Which hotels are offering discounts
Is there a way to get a discount on a hotel
metadata: Our recommendation is to be prepared by gathering information for several months. I can ask my non-Digital Humans to contact your most frequently booked hotels and negotiate discounts and savings on your behalf. Each hotel is different, so we can recommend which hotels you should talk to first.

examples: I just noticed a news release about a disturbance in Paris France today. Does my company have any travelers in Paris right now

Is there something going on in France right now
Do I have any travelers in France
Paris disturbance
metadata: here are two employees in Paris right now. Mona Miranda and Elissa Friedman are both in Paris today, based on their travel records. Would you like to contact them? I can provide their email addresses or phone numbers.

examples: Can I get their travel info
Can I get their travelers information
Please give me their info
I need their info ASAP
metadata: Ok. Mona Miranda’s phone number is 212-555-1212 and Elissa Friedman’s number is 305-555-1212. Do you need more information about their trips?

examples: Thank you - I do not have any more questions
No more questions today
No more questions Digital Person
Do I have any travelers in France
metadata: here are two employees in Paris right now. Mona Miranda and Elissa Friedman are both in Paris today, based on their travel records. Would you like to contact them? I can provide their email addresses or phone numbers.

examples: Yes please. When did they arrive and when do they leave Paris
Can I get their arrival and departure dates please
Please tell me when they arrived and when they will depart
metadata: Mona Miranda arrived in Paris January 9 and departs January 12 and Elissa Friedman arrived January 10 and departs January 17. Do you need more information about their trips?
